content: row 1 pick up 2 3 loops on hook work back row 2 pick up 4 5 loops on hook work back row 3 pick up 6 7 loops on hook work back row 4 pick up 8 9 loops on hook work back row 5 pick up 10 11 loops on hook work back row 6 pick up 12 13 loops on hook work back no color change row 7 pick up 14 15 loops on hook don t work back break yarn leaving about a 10 tail kitchener stitch the non slip knot end of the provisional crochet chain should be at the center of the circle begin unzipping the crochet chain to retrieve the reserved stitches on to a knitting needle as indicated in the video slip live stitches from 12th segment on to another needle starting at the center of the circle and using a tapestry needle and the long tail you left from the 12th segment hold your needles together and begin grafting with kitchener stitch setup pull tapestry needle as if to purl through the first stitch on the front needle pull tapestry needle as if to knit though the first stitch on the back needle *front needle pull tapestry needle as if to knit through the first stitch slip that stitch off the end of the needle pull through as if purl through the next stitch leave that stitch on the needle back needle pull tapestry needle as if to purl through the first stitch slip that stitch off the end of the needle pull through as if to knit on the next stitch leave that stitch on the needle * repeat between *s until two stitches remain one on the front needle and one on the back front needle pull tapestry needle through the stitch as if to knit slip that stitch off back needle pull tapestry needle through as if to purl slip that stitch off tighten the seam you just created and fasten_off coasters approximately 4 5 in diameter work as above but crochet chain 15 and pick up 9 stitches from the spine of the crochet chain for your provisional cast-on segments 1-11 row 1 pick up 2 3 loops on hook work back row 2 pick up 4 5 loops on hook work back row 3 pick up 6 7 loops on hook work back until 2 loops remain on hook break color a and start using color b pull new color through last two loops on hook row 4 pick up 8 9 loops on hook work back work row 1-4 11 times 12th segment row 1 pick up 2 3 loops on hook work back row 2 pick up 4 5 loops on hook work back row 3 pick up 6 7 loops on hook work back no color change row 4 pick up 8 9 loops on hook don t work back break yarn leaving about a 10 tail work the kitchener stitch as explained
